select t1.`status`, t1.main_photo, t1.auto_info_name, t2.starting_price, t3.transaction_fee, t3.create_time AS create_time, t4.user_name as publish_user_name, t2.auction_end_time, t2.auction_start_time, t1.id as carId, t1.car_auto_no from car_auto t1 left join car_auto_auction t2 on t2.id = t1.auto_auction_id left join car_order t3 on t3.car_id = t1.id left join car_manager_user t4 on t4.id = t1.create_user where t1.status != '0' AND t1.status != '1'
AND t2.auction_type=#{auctionType}
AND t1.store_id=#{departmentId}
AND t1.auto_info_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{autoInfoName}),'%')
AND (t1.status = '6' OR t1.status = '7')
AND (t1.status = '16' OR t1.status = '17')
AND (t1.status = '1' OR t1.status = '2' OR t1.status = '3' OR t1.status = '4' OR t1.status = '5')

AND (t1.status = '18' OR t1.status = '19')
order by t1.create_time desc
